body_html:
It's possible our GCC 6 build is broken (we only test for gcc 5.4 and gcc 7.2), which would be very annoying.

Re compilation time, a lot of code moved into C++ in 0.4.0, so I'd definitely expect it to take longer to compile than 0.3.1. Maybe not 3x as long though... worth investigating.

body:
It's possible our GCC 6 build is broken (we only test for gcc 5.4 and gcc 7.2), which would be very annoying.

Re compilation time, a lot of code moved into C++ in 0.4.0, so I'd definitely expect it to take longer to compile than 0.3.1. Maybe not 3x as long though... worth investigating.
